I'm from Chicago. This photo's from San Francisco. I used to think we had weird weather...

I have the same initials as Star Wars

How cool is that?

I study Computer Science at Northwestern University, where I'm in my last year.

At Northwestern, I do research in the Delta Lab's Design, Technology, and Research program. I'm also the Design Supervisor for Vertigo Productions, a student theater company dedicated to new work.

Currently, I'm a software engineering intern for Braintree, in San Francisco. I'm from Chicago - mountains are nuts.
